@Alexandra933 *can’t manufacture more with physics on our perpetual scale, as far as I know

@Alexandra933 In the real world, the world around us would then appear to be moving in slow motion. Applied in a digital or VR space, we lose or can modify the points of reference of the environment, and wouldn’t see it in slow motion. The result could be “more time”.

@Alexandra933 We can manufacture more on our scale with physics, but we can change our perception and experience of it. The trick would be to modify our consciousness to process more in a shorter amount of time.
Until we can hack it too - and even then, it won’t be accessible to everyone -Time is indeed the real currency. Our world otherwise is a non-zero sum game. https://t.co/GBP6Z0Ek1P
